HTTP status code 900

Custom error response, see example for a list of possible responses.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

[
  {
    "ErrorIdentifier": "ChatAlreadyClosed",
    "ErrorMessage": "The chat is already closed. It is not possible to send any more messages."
  },
  {
    "ErrorIdentifier": "ChatMessageTooBig",
    "ErrorMessage": "The chat message is too big."
  },
  {
    "ErrorIdentifier": "CouldNotSendMessage",
    "ErrorMessage": "The chat message could not be sent."
  }
]

/api/public/chat/{UserID}/accept-request post

post

Accepts a chat request.

post /api/public/chat/{UserID}/accept-request

Accepts a chat request.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • UserID: (string)

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: object

Properties
  • ChatID: required(string)

    Example:

    1234
  • Language: (string)

HTTP status code 200

The chat was successfully accepted.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 403

Access unauthorized.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 900

Custom error response, see example for a list of possible responses.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

[
  {
    "ErrorIdentifier": "ChatNotAsRequest",
    "ErrorMessage": "The chat request could not be processed."
  },
  {
    "ErrorIdentifier": "ChatTargetTypeDontMatch",
    "ErrorMessage": "The chat request could not be processed."
  }
]

/api/public/chat/{UserID}/available-channels get

get

Get a list of available chat channels.

get /api/public/chat/{UserID}/available-channels

Get a list of available chat channels.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • UserID: (string)

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of available chat channels.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

[
  {
    "ID": 1,
    "Name": "Chat channel name"
  }
]

/api/public/chat/{UserID}/history get

get

Get chat conversation history.

get /api/public/chat/{UserID}/history

Get chat conversation history.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • UserID: (string)

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Get chat conversation history.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Active": [
    {
      "ActiveUsers": [
        {
          "ChatterID": "tt",
          "ChatterName": "Theo Test",
          "ChatterType": "Customer",
          "LastMessageTime": "2018-09-14 18:48:51"
        },
        {
          "ChatterID": "4",
          "ChatterName": "Test Test",
          "ChatterType": "User",
          "LastMessageTime": "2018-09-14 22:01:50"
        }
      ],
      "Channel": "test",
      "ChannelID": 2,
      "ChatID": 1,
      "ChatMessages": [
        {
          "ChatterID": "tt",
          "ChatterName": "Theo Test",
          "ChatterType": "Customer",
          "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 18:48:51",
          "ID": 1,
          "MessageText": "Theo Test has joined this chat.<br/>\n",
          "SystemGenerated": 1
        },
        {
          "ChatterID": "tt",
          "ChatterName": "Theo Test",
          "ChatterType": "Customer",
          "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 18:48:51",
          "ID": 2,
          "MessageText": "help<br/>\n",
          "SystemGenerated": 0
        },
        {
          "ChatterID": "4",
          "ChatterName": "Test Test",
          "ChatterType": "User",
          "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 22:01:37",
          "ID": 5,
          "MessageText": "Test Test has joined this chat.<br/>\n",
          "SystemGenerated": 1
        },
        {
          "ChatterID": "4",
          "ChatterName": "Test Test",
          "ChatterType": "User",
          "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 22:01:50",
          "ID": 6,
          "MessageText": "what?<br/>\n",
          "SystemGenerated": 0
        }
      ],
      "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 18:48:51",
      "Invitation": 0,
      "Order": 0,
      "RequesterID": "tt",
      "RequesterName": "Theo Test",
      "RequesterType": "Customer",
      "Status": "active",
      "TargetType": "User",
      "TicketID": 0
    }
  ],
  "Closed": [],
  "IncomingRequests": [],
  "OutgoingRequests": [
    {
      "ActiveUsers": [
        {
          "ChatterID": "tt",
          "ChatterName": "Theo Test",
          "ChatterType": "Customer",
          "LastMessageTime": "2018-09-14 21:54:59"
        }
      ],
      "Channel": "test",
      "ChannelID": 2,
      "ChatID": 2,
      "ChatMessages": [
        {
          "ChatterID": "tt",
          "ChatterName": "Theo Test",
          "ChatterType": "Customer",
          "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 21:54:59",
          "ID": 3,
          "MessageText": "Theo Test has joined this chat.<br/>\n",
          "SystemGenerated": 1
        },
        {
          "ChatterID": "tt",
          "ChatterName": "Theo Test",
          "ChatterType": "Customer",
          "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 21:54:59",
          "ID": 4,
          "MessageText": "xxxx<br/>\n",
          "SystemGenerated": 0
        }
      ],
      "CreateTime": "2018-09-14 21:54:59",
      "Invitation": 0,
      "Order": 0,
      "RequesterID": "tt",
      "RequesterName": "Theo Test",
      "RequesterType": "Customer",
      "Status": "request",
      "TargetType": "User",
      "TicketID": 0
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 403

Access unauthorized.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/documentsearch post

post

Returns the document search result for the given search query and additional filters.

post /api/public/documentsearch

Returns the document search result for the given search query and additional filters.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: object

Properties
  • ActiveFilters: (string)
  • DocumentSearchType: (string)
  • FilterAggregations: (string)
  • LanguageFilter: (string)
  • LoadDocumentSearchTypes: (string)
  • MaxSearchItems: (string)
  • Page: (string)
  • SearchItemsPerPage: (string)
  • SearchQuery: required(string)

HTTP status code 200

Result for the normal document search.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "CurrentDocumentSearchType": {
    "Filters": [
      {
        "Identifier": "State",
        "Label": "State",
        "SubFilters": [
          {
            "Hits": 5,
            "Identifier": "StateOpen",
            "Label": "open"
          },
          {
            "Hits": 5,
            "Identifier": "StateClosedSuccessful",
            "Label": "closed successful"
          }
        ]
      }
    ],
    "Hits": 10,
    "Identifier": "Ticket"
  },
  "DocumentSearchTypes": [
    {
      "Hits": 10,
      "Identifier": "Ticket",
      "Label": "Tickets"
    },
    {
      "Hits": 5,
      "Identifier": "FAQ",
      "Label": "Knowledge Base Articles"
    }
  ],
  "SearchResult": [
    {
      "ChildDocumentSearchType": "ArticleMIME",
      "DocumentID": 123,
      "DocumentSearchType": "Ticket",
      "IsFromAttachment": 0,
      "Score": "4.123123",
      "Teasertext": "Some teaser <em>text</em> for the documentation.",
      "TicketNumber": "20180101407878",
      "Title": "Example article title"
    },
    {
      "DocumentID": 100,
      "DocumentSearchType": "Ticket",
      "Score": "3.523123",
      "Teasertext": "Some teaser <em>text</em> for the documentation.",
      "TicketNumber": "20180101407878",
      "Title": "Example ticket title"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/documentsearch/simple post

post

Returns a simple document search result for the given search query.

post /api/public/documentsearch/simple

Returns a simple document search result for the given search query.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: object

Properties
  • LanguageFilter: (string)
  • SearchQuery: required(string)

HTTP status code 200

Simple search result for the given search query.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Result": [
    {
      "SectionResult": [
        {
          "ChildDocumentSearchType": "ArticleMIME",
          "DocumentID": 123,
          "DocumentSearchType": "Ticket",
          "Score": "4.123123",
          "TicketNumber": "20180101407878",
          "Title": "Example article title"
        },
        {
          "DocumentID": 100,
          "DocumentSearchType": "Ticket",
          "Score": "3.523123",
          "TicketNumber": "20180101407878",
          "Title": "Example ticket title"
        }
      ],
      "SectionTitle": "Tickets",
      "SectionType": "Ticket"
    },
    {
      "SectionResult": [
        {
          "DocumentID": 120,
          "DocumentSearchType": "FAQ",
          "Score": "4.123123",
          "TicketNumber": [
            "Software",
            "Misc"
          ],
          "Title": "Example faq title"
        },
        {
          "Categories": [
            "Software",
            "Example"
          ],
          "DocumentID": 111,
          "DocumentSearchType": "FAQ",
          "Score": "3.523123",
          "Title": "Example faq title"
        }
      ],
      "SectionTitle": "Knowledge Base Articles",
      "SectionType": "FAQ"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/knowledge-base/article/list get

get

Returns a list of articles for the given category id.

get /api/public/knowledge-base/article/list

Returns a list of articles for the given category id.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

Query Parameters

  • ArticlesPerPage: (string)
  • Page: (string)

HTTP status code 200

Result for the normal category list.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Articles": [
    {
      "ID": 1,
      "Title": "Windows 95 problem..."
    },
    {
      "ID": 2,
      "Title": "Computer is broken..."
    }
  ],
  "TotalArticles": 0
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

post

  • Response

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

Media type: application/json

Type: object

Properties
  • Body: (string)
  • Languages: (string)
  • Limit: (string)
  • Subject: (string)

HTTP status code 200

Result for an existing knowledge base article or a given subject and body.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

    1.0.0

    "ID": 1,

  },
  {
    "ID": 2,
    "Title": "Article Title Test 2"

  {
    "ID": 3,
    "Title": "Article Title Test 3"
  }
]

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

/api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID} get

get

Returns the requested knowledge base article.

get /api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}

Returns the requested knowledge base article.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ArticleID: (string)

    Example:

    1234

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Result for an existing knowledge base article.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "CategoryID": 2,
  "Fields": [
    {
      "Caption": "Symptom",
      "Content": "New created pending states do not stop escalations with OTRSEscalationSuspend"
    },
    {
      "Caption": "Problem",
      "Content": "Description of the problem..."
    },
    {
      "Caption": "Solution",
      "Content": "The solution.... "
    },
    {
      "Caption": "Comment",
      "Content": "A comment..."
    }
  ],
  "ID": 32,
  "Number": 100032,
  "Title": "Article Title"
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

      "Message": "..."

  }

/api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/attachment/{AttachmentID} get head

get

Returns the attachment content for the given knowledge-base article.

head

Returns the attachment content for the given knowledge-base article.

get /api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/attachment/{AttachmentID}

Returns the attachment content for the given knowledge-base article.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ArticleID: (string)
  • AttachmentID: required(string)

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Indicates that the attachment was successfully returned.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 403

Indicates that the access to the attachment is denied (No access to the knowledge-base article).

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 404

Indicates that the attachment was not found.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."

  }

HTTP status code 403

Indicates that the access to the attachment is denied (No access to the knowledge-base article).

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 404

Indicates that the attachment was not found.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/related-articles get

get

Returns the related knowledge base articles.

get /api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/related-articles

Returns the related knowledge base articles.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ArticleID: (string)

    Example:

    1234

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Result for an existing knowledge base article or a given subject and body.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

[
  {
    "ID": 1,
    "Title": "Article Title Test 1"
  },
  {
    "ID": 2,
    "Title": "Article Title Test 2"
  },
  {
    "ID": 3,
    "Title": "Article Title Test 3"
  }
]

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/vote/check get

get

Checks if the voting buttons should be shown.

get /api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/vote/check

Checks if the voting buttons should be shown.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ArticleID: (string)

    Example:

    1234

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Check if voting buttons should be shown.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "ShowVotingButtons": 1
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/vote/send post

post

Checks if the voting buttons should be shown and also sending the vote for a knowledge base article.

post /api/public/knowledge-base/article/{ArticleID}/vote/send

Checks if the voting buttons should be shown and also sending the vote for a knowledge base article.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ArticleID: (string)

    Example:

    1234

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: object

Properties
  • Vote: required(string)

HTTP status code 200

Check if voting buttons should be shown. Voting success for an existing knowledge base article vote.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "ShowVotingButtons": 1,
  "VoteSuccess": 1
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 900

Custom error response, see example for a list of possible responses.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

[
  {
    "ErrorIdentifier": "CouldNotVote",
    "ErrorMessage": "The voting could not be saved."
  }
]

/api/public/knowledge-base/categorylist get

get

Returns a list of subcategories for the given category id.

get /api/public/knowledge-base/categorylist

Returns a list of subcategories for the given category id.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Result for the normal category list.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Category": {
    "CategoryID": 1,
    "Comment": "This is my first category.",
    "Name": "Home"
  },
  "CategoryPath": [
    {
      "CategoryID": 2,
      "Comment": "For all Hardware questions.",
      "Name": "Hardware"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 4,
      "Comment": "For Computer.",
      "Name": "Computer"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 5,
      "Comment": "For Notebooks.",
      "Name": "Notebook"
    }
  ],
  "SubCategories": [
    {
      "CategoryID": 2,
      "Comment": "This is my second category.",
      "Name": "Special"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 3,
      "Comment": "This is my third category.",
      "Name": "Product A"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 4,
      "Comment": "This is my fourth category.",
      "Name": "Product B"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/knowledge-base/categorylist/{CategoryID} get

get

Returns a list of subcategories for the given category id.

get /api/public/knowledge-base/categorylist/{CategoryID}

Returns a list of subcategories for the given category id.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • CategoryID: (string)

    Example:

    1234

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

HTTP status code 200

Result for the normal category list.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Category": {
    "CategoryID": 1,
    "Comment": "This is my first category.",
    "Name": "Home"
  },
  "CategoryPath": [
    {
      "CategoryID": 2,
      "Comment": "For all Hardware questions.",
      "Name": "Hardware"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 4,
      "Comment": "For Computer.",
      "Name": "Computer"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 5,
      "Comment": "For Notebooks.",
      "Name": "Notebook"
    }
  ],
  "SubCategories": [
    {
      "CategoryID": 2,
      "Comment": "This is my second category.",
      "Name": "Special"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 3,
      "Comment": "This is my third category.",
      "Name": "Product A"
    },
    {
      "CategoryID": 4,
      "Comment": "This is my fourth category.",
      "Name": "Product B"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}

/api/public/package/repository get

get

Fetch package repository data

get /api/public/package/repository

Fetch package repository data

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug: (string)

    Optional, enables debugging information in responses based on the settings in WebApp.conf.

    Example:

    true

Query Parameters

  • File: required(string)

HTTP status code 200

Add description for example responses.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

HTTP status code 422

Invalid input data.

Headers

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-SQLTrace: (string)

    Includes SQL debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_sql_trace' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Debug-STDERRLog: (string)

    Includes STDERR debugging information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent and 'enable_debugger_stderr_log' is enabled.

  • X-OTRS-API-Version: required(string)

    Provides endpoint version information, if 'X-OTRS-API-Debug' was sent.

    Example:

    1.0.0

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "Errors": {
    "Field1": {
      "Message": "..."
    }
  }
}
